title: Want to watch Super Bowl 2026 in high-quality 4k video? Here's how.

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Want to watch Super Bowl 2026 in high-quality 4k video? Here's how.
sources.description: It's almost time for Super Bowl 60. NBC will broadcast the game, which starts at 6:30 p.m. ET on Sunday, Feb. 8, in higher resolution 4K video.
